metadata.title: CVE-2024-46958 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In Nextcloud Desktop Client 3.13.1 through 3.13.3 on Linux, synchronizedfiles (between the server and client) may become world writable or worldreadable. This is fixed in 3.13.4.

criterions.comment: nextcloud-desktop package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
